description: This file defines the SectionMask class, which manages a set of section flags for categorizing elements such as events, POJOs, and messages in a wrapper. It provides methods to add sections and check if a section is included, utilizing bitmask operations.

classes.name: SectionMask
classes.description: A class representing a bitmask for different sections in a wrapper, allowing addition and checking of section categories such as event, POJO, and message.

methods.name: SectionMask
methods.description: Default constructor initializing the section mask to zero.

methods.name: addEventSection
methods.description: Sets the event section bit in the mask.

methods.name: inEventSection
methods.description: Checks if the event section bit is set in the mask.

methods.name: addPojoSection
methods.description: Sets the POJO section bit in the mask.

methods.name: inPojoSection
methods.description: Checks if the POJO section bit is set in the mask.

methods.name: addMessageSection
methods.description: Sets the message section bit in the mask.

methods.name: inMessageSection
methods.description: Checks if the message section bit is set in the mask.
